metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9759 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Vulnerability of LG Electronic web OS TV Emulator could allow an attacker to escalate privileges and overwrite certain files. This vulnerability is due to wrong environment setting. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability through crafted configuration files and executable files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9759` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

weechat - 2.7.1-1
weechat-core - 2.7.1-1
weechat-curses - 2.7.1-1
weechat-guile - 2.7.1-1
weechat-headless - 2.7.1-1
weechat-lua - 2.7.1-1
weechat-perl - 2.7.1-1
weechat-php - 2.7.1-1
weechat-plugins - 2.7.1-1
weechat-python - 2.7.1-1
weechat-ruby - 2.7.1-1
weechat-tcl - 2.7.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: weechat package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.1-1').
